# Project Code Patterns

## Naming Conventions

Use the following naming conventions:

- Classes and types: PascalCase (e.g., `UserService`, `ApiResponse`)
- Functions and variables: camelCase (e.g., `getUserData`, `processRequest`)
- Functions and variables: snake_case (e.g., `get_user_data`, `process_request`)
